duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager in overseeing station store operations including staff supervision, daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, ensuring customer satisfaction.
Execute the food program and set an example for the staff in terms of customer care and urgency.
Lead a team of employees, handling recruiting, interviewing, hiring, delegation, follow-up, teaching, motivating, and planning.
Ensure facility maintenance, cleanliness, and product display to enhance customer experience and drive sales.
Manage sales, financial controls, staff activities, security controls, and administrative duties as directed by the Store Manager.
Maintain accurate records of cash, sales, payroll, and inventory, troubleshoot daily close-out and shift sales analysis, and provide regular onsite attendance.
Prepare and transmit periodic sales, product, and operating reports, attend job-related meetings, and complete daily store reports.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred. Knowledge of basic business and customer service principles required.
